title: Multiparty Republics in Mexico and Nigeria

content.prompt: Which of the following statements explains how sources of power and authority have affected two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries?

choices.label: Religion has helped shape the postrevolutionary governments of Iran and China.
The Mexican and Nigerian constitutions have helped the countries develop competitive party systems.
The legislatures in Russia and the United Kingdom have helped the countries become more democratic.
The military in Nigeria and Iran have helped the countries remain politically stable over time.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the implications of the similarities and differences between countries with similar political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
